Inzaghi, Allegri downplay importance of Inter-Juve clashBoth Inter Milan manager Simone Inzaghi and Juventus coach Massimiliano Allegri downplayed the significance of Sunday's top-of-the-table Serie A clash between the two sides as the title battle intensifies. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 18:21:31 GMT XNPJVAZKK5PHHGBKWI2E2MPHEY https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/inzaghi-allegri-downplay-importance-inter-juve-clash-2024-02-03/Reuters运动的足球
Suspected militants kill four Nigerian police officersAt least four police officers were killed in Nigeria's northeast Borno state after a gun battle with suspected Islamist insurgents, a police spokesperson said on Saturday. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:44:57 GMT ZXYTTZK2CBPDZILLCV6D3EJW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/suspected-militants-kill-four-nigerian-police-officers-2024-02-03/Reuters世界非洲
Pope condemns anti-Judaism, anti-Semitism amid new wave of attacks against JewsPope Francis condemned all forms of anti-Judaism and anti-Semitism, labelling them as a "sin against God", after noticing an increase in attacks against Jews around the world. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:19:08 GMT 2E3DQ5OD7FOHNGBKKSS72FHPPU https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-condemns-anti-judaism-anti-semitism-amid-new-wave-attacks-against-jews-2024-02-03/Reuters世界
Raging forest fires kill at least 19 in Chile; toll expected to riseAt least 19 people were killed by forest fires in the coastal tourist city of Vina del Mar and the death toll could rise in the coming hours as rescue teams reach more affected areas, Interior Minister Carolina Toha said on Saturday. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:18:31 GMT U5Y33TUG55PUTDVB73N6ECUEBU https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/raging-forest-fires-kill-least-19-chile-toll-expected-rise-2024-02-03/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Swiss farmers protest against low produce pricesSwiss farmers drove their tractors to Geneva on Saturday to protest against rising costs and low prices for their produce, joining a movement that has spread across Europe. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 16:54:42 GMT ESZN6H5IF5MGZBXDD7V6OF4GMI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-farmers-protest-against-low-product-prices-2024-02-03/Reuters商业工作世界
Russia says 5 killed after Ukraine attack on bakery in occupied eastRussia's emergencies ministry said the bodies of five people were pulled from the rubble of a bakery in the Russian-occupied region of Luhansk in eastern Ukraine on Saturday following what Russian-installed officials said was a Ukrainian attack. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 16:21:57 GMT FW5O4I47HFNJBHF2K7GWVU2QRY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-appointed-official-says-ukraine-shells-bakery-occupied-eastern-ukraine-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkey completes new homes in area hit by devastating earthquakeTurkey on Saturday handed over keys to newly-completed homes to some of those left homeless after last year's devastating earthquake, one year after the country's deadliest disaster in its modern history. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 15:28:43 GMT 2CYKGB3FZVONZO6XCVMS3LJ754 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-completes-new-homes-area-hit-by-devastating-earthquake-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中东
Around 200,000 gather across Germany in latest protests against far-rightAround 200,000 people took to the streets in Germany on Saturday, most of them in the capital Berlin, as nationwide protests against the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) party entered their fourth week. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 14:01:38 GMT OUBSYM4PBBOERJYOMP4NQR6PWM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/least-120000-gather-berlin-latest-round-protests-against-far-right-2024-02-03/Andreas Rinke, Christoph Steitz世界欧洲
Journalists briefly detained in Moscow at protest by soldiers' wivesAround 20 journalists were detained by police in central Moscow for several hours on Saturday at a rally of Russian soldiers' wives calling for their men to be returned from the front in Ukraine, a Reuters witness said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:40:34 GMT JENHLKNI7JPPPOKWEZXTGXW7EU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dozens-detained-moscow-rally- Russian-soldiers-wives-rights-group-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, son of Italy's last king, dies aged 86Vittorio Emanuele of Savoy, the only son of Italy's last king, who lived in exile in neighbouring Switzerland for most of his life, has died aged 86 at his home in Geneva, the Royal House of Savoy said. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 13:06:54 GMT SEW3A4YNKNPQZFQYBLTFNXCVGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/obituary-vittorio-emanuele-savoy-son-italys-last-king-dies-ged-86-2024-02-03/Reuters世界欧洲
U.S. launches strikes in Iraq, Syria, nearly 40 reported killedThe strikes, which included the use of long-range B-1 bombers flown from the United States, were the first in a U.S. response to an attack in Jordan last weekend by Iran-backed militants that killed three U.S. troops. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 11:48:14 GMT 4ETDYVPK2FPAHKV7G5NZ6YE6CI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-launches-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-nearly-40-reported-killed-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali, Timour Azhari世界
